column4: When I install something via synaptic that creates menu entries, it *should* run update-menus so that the non-Gnome window managers get updated menu files. Gutsy, it seems, does not do this. How do I make it do this?
open a term and type sudo update-menus
Yes, that's how I do it by hand. As I say, I want it to do it automatically after I install some softwrae.
I would like to unwonk it.
